name: it_p_launcher
description: Launcher for IT-PROCESSES by Yasin Yazici (CEO)

scripts.check-coverage: nyc npm run test && nyc report
scripts.start:build:mac: npm run compile && npm run copyassets:linux && npm run start
scripts.start:build:windows: npm run copyassets:windows && npm run compile && npm run start
scripts.obfuscate:start-windows: npm run obfuscate && npm run copyassets:windows:obfuscated && electron ./obfuscated/dist/main.js
scripts.obfuscate:start-linux: npm run obfuscate && npm run copyassets:linux:obfuscated && electron ./obfuscated/dist/main.js
scripts.deploy:windows: npm run test && npm run compile && npm run obfuscate && npm run copyassets:windows:prod && npm run uglify:obfuscated
scripts.deploy:linux: npm run test && npm run compile && npm run obfuscate && npm run copyassets:linux:obfuscated && electron-packager ./obfuscated/dist --overwrite --asar --dist=darwin
scripts.deploy:soft: npm run test && npm run compile && npm run obfuscate && npm run copyassets:windows:obfuscated && electron-packager ./obfuscated/dist --overwrite --asar

author: Yasin Yazici
